description: ALBInstance describes all configs to create the alb resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: Specification of the desired behavior of the LoadBalancer.

blockCascadeDeletion.description: block cascade deletion when deleting the last associated ingress. Deprecated: will not use soon.

instance.description: Specify alb instance spec. Required when creating new alb instance.

addressType.description: The address type of alb instance. Supported types: public(default), private

deleteProtection.description: The DeleteProtection status for alb instance. Supported: on, off(default)

eipSpec.description: The EIP config for public alb instance.

ipVersion.description: The IPVersion of alb instance. Supported types: ipv4(default), ipv6

name.description: The specified name of alb instance.

zoneMappings.description: The list of subnet in different available zone

instanceID.description: Only apply when using exist alb instance.

listeners.description: Specify listener specs of alb instance.

certificateID.description: CertificateID specify the certificate of HTTPS listener.

certificateSource.description: CertificateSource specify the certificate source of cert.

domainExtensions.description: Extension domains for the HTTPS listener.

certificateID.description: The Certificate id for the extension domain.

domain.description: Extension domain for the HTTPS listener.

enableHTTP2.description: EnableHTTP2 enable http2 for HTTPS listener.

enableQUIC.description: EnableQUIC enable quic for HTTPS listener.

protocol.description: Protocol of listener Supported types: HTTP(default), HTTPS

status.description: Most recently observed status of the LoadBalancer.

ingress.description: Ingress represents the ingress infos of alb instance.

hostname.description: Hostname is set for load-balancer ingress points that are DNS based (typically AWS load-balancers)

ip.description: IP is set for load-balancer ingress points that are IP based (typically GCE or OpenStack load-balancers)

ports.description: Ports is a list of records of service ports If used, every port defined in the service should have an entry in it

error.description: Error is to record the problem with the service port The format of the error shall comply with the following rules: - built-in error values shall be specified in this file and those shall use CamelCase names - cloud provider specific error values must have names that comply with the format foo.example.com/CamelCase. --- The regex it matches is (dns1123SubdomainFmt/)?(qualifiedNameFmt)

port.description: Port is the port number of the service port of which status is recorded here

protocol.description: Protocol is the protocol of the service port of which status is recorded here The supported values are: "TCP", "UDP", "SCTP"

instanceID.description: InstanceID represents the alb instance id.

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of alb instance.
